projects.name: AdonisJS
projects.description: AdonisJS is a fully typed TypeScript framework that includes everything you need to build robust applications. ORM, authentication, caching, rate limiter, file uploads, and support for testing - all in a single cohesive package

projects.name: Japa
projects.description: Japa is a testing framework for Node.js that focuses primarily on testing backend applications. Japa does not require using any build tools and is significantly smaller and faster than Jest and Vitest

projects.name: VineJS
projects.description: VineJS is a fast and type-safe validation library for Node.js, designed for validating form data and JSON payloads. It offers 50+ built-in rules, 12 schema types, customizable error messages, and first-class support for extending with custom rules or schema types ‚Äî all while being one of the fastest libraries in the Node.js ecosystem.

projects.name: EdgeJS
projects.description: Edge is a simple, Modern, and batteries included template engine for Node.js. In the age of frontend frameworks, Edge allows you to embrace the simplicity of server-side templates.

projects.name: Youch
projects.description: Youch is an error-parsing library that pretty prints JavaScript errors on a web page or the terminal.

plans.name: Insiders program - Individual
plans.description:
All sponsors under this tier are automatically invited to the Insiders program, which provides them with exclusive benefits.

- Open-source packages: Gain early access to alpha release packages with complete documentation, allowing you to provide feedback and influence features before public release.
- Example projects: Get early access to the source code of production-ready example apps built using AdonisJS. Ask questions around the design decisions, or contribute features to it.

plans.name: Insiders program - Teams
plans.description:

- Prominent logo placement on the AdonisJS website homepage
- Featured announcement across AdonisJS social and newsletter channels
